contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 17, 2007 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-second-section
California Legend
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Solo Cornet - Penclawdd Brass Prizes - 1st £300, 2nd £190, 3rd £130. 5 bands competed.
2007 Welsh League Champions: Gwaun Cae Gurwen Runners Up: Penclawdd Brass
April 8, 2012, 9:47 a.m. July 2, 2020, 9:59 a.m.
1 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
2 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
3 Blaenavon Town Band Gareth Ritter
4 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Rhys Davies
5 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans
Withdrawn Llwydcoed Band Unknown
Withdrawn Pontypool Brass Patrick O'Leary
